amendment.description: Amendment bars funds made available in the bill from being used to extend temporary protected status for nationals of a country beyond the original period of not more than 18 months.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibits funds to be used to extend the designation of any foreign state under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 298 (Roll no. 487).
